name: Bangkok Aviation Center (BAC)
about: Bangkok Aviation Center (BAC) is the first private flying school in Thailand, offering comprehensive pilot training courses for those aspiring to become licensed pilots. Located at the BAC airfield in Klong 15, Nakhon-nayok Province, and additionally at Nakhon Ratchasima Airport, BAC provides a diverse training environment to expose students to various airfields and routes. With professional instructors and state-of-the-art facilities, BAC is committed to excellence in aviation education, ensuring students receive top-notch training to prepare them for a successful career in aviation. BAC's holistic approach to training makes it a leading institution in aviation technology education.
services:
["Private Pilot-Airplane Course
Commercial Pilot-Airplane Course
Core Flying Skill for MPL
Airline Transport Pilot-Airplane Course
Multi-Crew Co-Operation Course
Instrument Rating Course
Multi-Engine Rating
Instructor Pilot Course
Recurrent Training Course
Requalification for License/Rating Revocation
Multi-Engine Conversion Course"]
